title: fix(social): use main branch in Buffer image URLs
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Updates the social media pipeline to reference main branch image URLs, preventing errors when feature branches are deleted.
gist.impact: Ensures reliable automated posting to Buffer by fixing image 404 errors.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee fixing a broken link in a chain or a pipe. Represents the connection to Buffer being repaired.
gist.image_prompt: Pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee connecting a cable to a main server hub. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Tiny bee character with chunky retro sprites fixing a connection. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Pixel text 'LINKED'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
